messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4897
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/25/2004 10:40:39 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Harpers Ferry is fun. About 35 miles from DC. The
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/25/2004 10:40:39 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Harpers Ferry is fun. About 35 miles from DC. The Mannassas battlefields look
like....big fields.....

Shyrley who used to live there.
I agree! There is a spot on top of the mountain called Jefferson's Rock.
Thomas Jefferson visited there and said that it was a view worth crosssing
the atlantic for. If you'd like to we could meet up there!!
Elissa Jill, who still lives 8 miles from there.
Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
